overview: A children's nativity play, written by Gaynor Boddy & Rebecca Kincaid. You may have met some of the nativity characters before, but you haven't met Grumble; the grumpy, grumbly donkey who travels with Mary and Joseph to Bethlehem.  Discover a particularly special bundle of joy this Christmas, with our beautifully simple, brand-new nativity that is bundles of fun!
title: A Bundle Of Joy
